meanings: (손으로 쥐다) hold (sth in one's hand), take, (꽉) grasp, grip, (literary) clasp, (갑작스레) grab, seize

meanings.meaning: catch, get, grab, take, etc. (a) hold of somebody/something

vlive.korean: [비닐 너어... 내가 멱살 잡고 뜯어내기 전에] 뭐야? 이거 어떻게 먹어...? [Plastic wrap... Before I grab you by the collar] How can I open this? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [THE BOYZ] 치즈 콜렉터 째짜니 모짜렐라 치즈로 돌돌말아 둥가둥가 해버려🧀 (NEW eating cheese tteokbokki set)
vlive.english: [Plastic wrap... Before I grab you by the collar] How can I open this?

vlive.korean: 2단계: 잡고... Second step: Hold... 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : HAPPY MAY BIRTHDAY🎂
너는 에이티니도 못 잡고 나도 못 잡았어 - 왜? You failed to attract ATINY and me, both. - Why? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 티니야 맏즈 왔다🙋‍♂️

vlive.english: I think he set the wrong concept. - Really?
